name: Avery Heavy-Duty View 3 Ring Binder, 1" One Touch Slant Rings, Holds 8.5" x 11" Paper, 1 Black Binder (05300)
short_description: Heavy-Duty binders have a DuraHinge design that's stronger, lasts longer and resists tearing, while the DuraEdge feature makes the sides and top more pliable to resist splitting
Deep texture film offers a smoother finish and features a linen pattern for high-quality look and feel
Nonstick, archival-safe material means binders won't lift ink or toner off printed pages
Wide front and back binder panels fully cover standard dividers and sheet protectors
Organize and secure paper with four stacked pockets
product_description: With this Heavy-Duty Nonstick View Binder you get one-touch operation and everyday durability. The DuraHinge design is stronger, lasts longer and resists tearing, while the DuraEdge feature makes the sides and top more pliable to resist splitting. A deep texture film offers a smoother finish and features a linen pattern for high-quality look and feel. The nonstick material prevents the cover from lifting toner or ink off printed pages making it ideal for archival projects. The slant rings have a higher page capacity compared to same size round rings and wider front and back binder panels fully cover standard dividers and sheet protectors. Easily store loose papers in the four clear interior pockets. Customize your title page using free templates and designs on the Avery site.

product_description: The Avery Durable View 3 Ring Binder is an essential for home organization, office needs, or school supplies. This set of 4 binders is great for those seeking binders capable of handling extensive paperwork. Each binder features 1.5-inch slant rings, accommodating up to 375 sheets, making them ideal for a variety of tasks, whether as a wedding planning book and organizer or a school organizer. The tear-resistant DuraHinge spine and DuraEdge split-resistant edges offer durability beyond standard three ring binders, delivering longevity and protection. Customizing these binders is a breeze with a clear view cover, allowing you to personalize the spine, front, and back cover for easy identification. For added convenience, each 1.5 inch binder includes two interior clear pockets made from nonstick PVC-free material, protecting your documents from ink smudges. Utilize the binder pockets and plastic pockets for paper 8.5x11 to keep your pages pristine and organized. Whether using them as a wedding binder or for storing important schoolwork, these Avery binders deliver versatility and strength. Ideal as a large 3 ring binder option for home, school, or office use, these binders are a great choice when you need reliable and stylish organization.
